Summary: Strange light appeared in front of us out of nowhere, started a pulsting glow and head towards the moon, than goes down and disappeared out of sight !
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were sitting by the river Vardar in Skopje,Macedonia and in the clear sky something appeared out of nowhere in front of us, at first it was a small light and in about 10 sec it becomes larger and start moving towards the moon.It was like a circle glowing and changing color, it was night, the time about 01:30 am( Europe Time) and maybe far away so i caught it with my cell phone cam. i was with 3 friends and we all see it ! I think it was a big object because when it passed in front of the moon looked alike, maybe I'm wrong, don't know... than it started going down and disappeared!
trends: There have been no other sightings in Skopje
This sighting has never been favorited.
